item.title: Inadequate statistical power to detect clinically significant differences in adverse event rates in randomized controlled trials
item.description: Ruth Tsang, Lindsey Colley, Larry D Lynd “Inadequate statistical power to detect clinically significant differences in adverse event rates in randomized controlled trials” (2009) // Journal of Clinical Epidemiology. Publisher: Elsevier BV. Vol. 62. No 6. Pp. 609–616.
